artifacts.summary: v002 partial implementation: Phases 3-5 complete (shiftClosedCanonicalOmega, box_persistent, shifted truth lemma, Validity.lean changes), Phase 6 partial (temporal_duality blocked on SoundnessLemmas.lean update)

partial_progress.details: Phases 3-5 complete, Phase 6 partial. temporal_duality case in Soundness.lean has sorry pending SoundnessLemmas.lean update (~30 lemmas need Omega parameterization).

review_reason: Phase 6 requires substantial additional work: SoundnessLemmas.lean (~972 lines, ~30 lemmas) needs updating to use Omega-parameterized validity. This was not anticipated in the plan and adds ~4-6 hours of work.

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented core infrastructure for ShiftClosed Omega approach: shiftClosedCanonicalOmega, box_persistent lemma, shifted truth lemma, and Validity.lean parameterization. Soundness partially updated but blocked on SoundnessLemmas.lean (~30 lemmas need Omega parameters). Build succeeds with 10 active sorries (1 new in temporal_duality).
